heading: This Afternoon
temperature: Low to mid 40s, some upper 40s in western valleys

heading: Tonight
text: Rain mixing with or changing to snow, from west to east.
temperature: Low to mid 30s, except 20 in far northern NY

heading: Thursday
text: Snow over high terrain; any valley rain changing to snow showers.

heading: Friday
text: Morning clouds giving way to sun. Colder.
